# Generated by Next.js

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Allow all search engines to index the blog
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /*.json$

# Allow important content paths
Allow: /posts/
Allow: /tags/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /feed.xml

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://developjik.dev/sitemap.xml

# Popular search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /

# Crawl delay for politeness
Crawl-delay: 1
